name: Fear: The Spooky Dead Survival
description:
welcome to the The fear: spooky dead survival in school. Get into the school and find the clues of lost kids. It is said that almost two years ago children started to disappear from a very ordinary school. All the search for them was in vain: the police efforts failed, and the local government closed the school off. The place became haunted and remain closed for uncertain circumstances.
Years later, our brave young man enter the scary school once again with the survival mission and find the lost kids, He will tries to rescue the stolen souls of the lost children. But he has to faced many problems and have to fight with the evil spirit as well

Download haunted fun and be the brave person
Features
- Intuitive touch controls
- Amazing and evolving sound
- Incredible, horror and challenging rooms
- Fearful and tension atmosphere
- challenging but interesting levels
